response.overview: In a gripping psychological horror, a timid medical student, Kaushik, finds himself battling not only his inner demons but also a malevolent spirit named Ghatikachalam, who haunts his mind. As his family seeks answers through spiritual remedies, Movie winds through many interesting twists and turns in a quest to find the truth. Unraveling a tale of suppressed desires and a fight for Kaushik's sanity in the face of a sinister presence.
response.tagline: Get ready for a spine-chilling ride like no other
response.title: Ghatikachalam
